get.description: Query your kits and return a summary, sorted by creation date. Providing any query params will further filter the results to only those that match the query params.

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page. Must be in range 1-100. Default is 10.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Only retrieve kits associated with this email address. Case insensitive.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Only retrieve kits associated with this first name. Case insensitive.

parameters.name: kit_type
parameters.description: Only retrieve kits associated with this kit type.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Only retrieve kits associated with this last name. Case insensitive.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Only retrieve kits associated with this phone number.

parameters.name: kit_status
parameters.description: Only retrieve kits whose most recent event is this status.

parameters.name: sample_status
parameters.description: Only retrieve kits whose sample's most recent event is this status.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders created on or before this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders created on or after this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: updated_before
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders updated on or before this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: updated_after
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders updated on or after this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

get.description: Get an array of all valid kit types that can be created.
Returns an individual kit with the given kit id.

parameters.name: public_id
parameters.description: ID of the kit to retrieve.

get.description: Get a list of your orders sorted by recently updated. Providing any query params will further filter the results to only those that match the query params.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders associated with this email address.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders associated with this first name.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders associated with this last name.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders associated with this phone number.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders that have this status.

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: Number of results to return. Must be in range 1-100. Default is 10.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders created on or before this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders created on or after this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: updated_before
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders updated on or before this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: updated_after
parameters.description: Only retrieve orders updated on or after this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

post.description: Create an order for delivering kits to a client, which will be created with a status of 'pending'.The order will be created with the user making the request as the 'placed_by' user.

get.description: Retrieve a singular order matching the provided ID.

parameters.name: public_id
parameters.description: The ID of the order to retrieve.

post.description: Replace the metadata for an order with a new set of values

parameters.name: public_id
parameters.description: The ID of the order to retrieve.

metadata.description: The metadata to replace the existing metadata with.

post.description: Generate a one-time-use registration token for a patient with a lifetime of 10 minutes.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Filter by first name.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Filter by last name.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter by email.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Filter by phone number.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to retrieve.

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: The number of results to retrieve per page.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the requisition to retrieve.

kit_types.description: A list of all the kit types to place in the order.

metadata.description: An optional dictionary of key-value pairs stored with the order.

barcode.description: The barcode of the sample mailed to the lab

first_name.description: The first name of the patient.

last_name.description: The last name of the patient to be created.

email.description: The email of the patient to be created.

phone.description: Optional phone number of the patient.

sex.description: The biological sex of the patient to be created.

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the patient to be created.

kit_id.description: The unique identifier of the kit.

events.description: A list of all the events that have occurred for this kit.

created.description: The date and time the event occurred.

KitStatus.description: The new status of the kit.

kit_id.description: The unique identifier of the kit.

order_id.description: The order the kit belongs to.

created.description: The date and time the kit was created.

updated.description: The date and time the kit was last updated.

order_id.description: The unique identifier of the order.

kit_types.description: A list of the kit types that are included in this order.

created.description: The date and time the order was created.

updated.description: The date and time the order was last updated.

metadata.description: An optional dictionary of key-value pairs stored with the order.

order_id.description: The unique identifier of the order.

kit_types.description: A list of the kit types that are included in this order.

metadata.description: An optional dictionary of key-value pairs stored with the order.

created.description: The date and time the order was created.

updated.description: The date and time the order was last updated.

first_name.description: The first name of the patient.

last_name.description: The last name of the patient to be created.

email.description: The email of the patient to be created.

phone.description: Optional phone number of the patient.

sex.description: The biological sex of the patient to be created.

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the patient to be created.

phone.description: Recipient's phone number, as a string.

pdf.description: A URL to the PDF report.

txt.description: A URL to the TXT report.

is_amendment.description: Whether this report is an amendment to a previous report.
